definitions.definition: A person who broils , someone who cooks by broiling.
A device used to broil food; part of an oven or a small stove ; known as a grill in British English.

subdefinitions.definition: Specifically, a young chicken 6 to 10 weeks old, as contrasted with a roaster .

definitions.definition: One who engages in or promotes noisy quarrels, or broils.

main_definition: A person who broils , someone who cooks by broiling.
secondary_definitions: ( cooking , Canada , US ) A device used to broil food; part of an oven or a small stove ; known as a grill in British English.
( archaic ) One who engages in or promotes noisy quarrels, or broils.
